entry.title: Friday: Snow. High minus 7.
entry.summary: Snow ending near noon then cloudy. Amount 2 cm. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light this morning. High minus 7. Wind chill minus 20 this morning and minus 13 this afternoon. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Friday 17 February 2023
